description: This agent implements a hint system for a Sudoku game, selecting the most helpful cell to reveal to the user based on various strategies.
This agent analyzes documentation to understand its purpose and structure.
This agent verifies that Claude Code has completed the given plan by inspecting the codebase and conversation transcript.
This agent provides guidance on how to interact with other agents, clarifying expectations and proactively offering assistance.
This agent is responsible for executing bash commands efficiently and safely within Claude Code.
